Reviews.Title: Would buy again
Reviews.Author: Earl R. Wilt
Reviews.Content: For the money, I believe this to be the best buy right now. The picture quality is very good, perhaps only surpassed by Samsung, but Samsung costs much more. The sound quality is better than average, and better than Samsung because of the front facing speakers. The TV itself is very attractive and is very easy to set up and navigate the menus. If I had to do it over again I would buy this model. Also, unlike most TVs, it's made in America, so...Amazon.com had the best price, and shipping was reasonably quick. (free)

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: L. Peterson "hooked on books"
Reviews.Content: Picked it up at Sam's Club for $298.  Had it for a week now and so far....so good.  Very clear picture with GREAT sound.  Compared prices at other places and found this price to be at least $60 cheaper than anywhere else.  Simple setup from box, we were watching programs in less than 15 minutes.  I believe with this television we got more bang for our buck.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: A. MacMahon "engineer"
Reviews.Content: We picked this up at a local supercenter and have been pleased with it right out of the box. Really easy set up and looks great with the blue-ray player.Some of the better features include:- A smart sound adjustment that keeps commercials from getting ridiculously loud.- Four different picture sizes to adjust for wide screen and standard TV.- Eco mode that isn't as bright and brilliant, but saves on power consumption.- Easy USB connect to view pics on the TV in a slide show format.- The screen itself is a sort of matte texture, so the chance of glare is reduced greatly.- Just about everything is customizable for Picture, Audio, Channel locking, etc. (especially if you get into advanced menus)Cons- The picture doesn't look all that awesome with normal TV, but that's just how they get you to buy the "HD package" I suppose.- The stand that the TV comes with is not adjustable at all!- The Vizio symbol stays lit even when the TV is off... How is that eco-friendly?All in all though, this is a great budget TV that works well in smaller rooms, and still looks good.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for both HD and non-HD channels
Reviews.Author: foster72
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my home office.  Since I'm using basic cable in this room, I wanted a TV that could display non-HD channels better than my high-end plasma.This TV fits the bill perfectly.  The digital, non-HD channels look very good.  The "wide" mode allows the 4:3 480i channels to fill the screen without looking too stretched.  Plus, the "vivid" picture mode really looks nice and bright.I also have an indoor antenna hooked up to this TV to receive local HD channels.  I think the HD channels look better on this $300 720p TV than my expensive 1080p plasma.Finally, the speakers on this TV are quite good.  I wanted a TV that had front projection speakers, since it wouldn't be hooked up to a surround-sound system.  The speakers sound great, with nice EQ options.

Reviews.Title: Bad Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Katie Guida "Katie"
Reviews.Content: We bought this tv a month ago, and something happened with the input lock. Now the tv will not turn on.  Customer Service was called two weeks ago, and they said it would take 5-7 days to get the part needed to fix the tv (also stated that it was an easy fix).  We called back at 7 days, and was told that they would return a call to update us on where the part was at.  Never got a call back, so we called again the same day.  Then we were told that the part would take 7-10 days to get the part, or we could return it.  Now it's been 2.5 weeks, still no part, and they cannot tell us where the part is until next week.  The service at Vizio has not been helpful, and I will NOT be buying a Vizio ever again.  There is too much of a chance that we would have to deal with their horrible customer service again!

Reviews.Title: 5 stars
Reviews.Author: Raleigh2222
Reviews.Content: Was looking for something else, and happened to see my TV and the other reviews.  Just to balance things out. My Vizio 32" is 10 months old now and working great.  Been played average of 8 hours a day everyday and picture and sound still sharp and clear.  Took longer to assemble the wall bracket than to plug in and program all the features.  Price is even better now than when I bought mine.

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: Michael W. Black "Michael"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to move up from my old 26 inch "anchor". Although the old tv was fine I did get tired of the faint analog lines on the screen. My first lcd was a 22 in Samsung, and they need to do some serious work on their audio speakers!Anyway I found this 32 in Vizio quite outstanding for the money. The setup was easy and the picture quality is beautiful. Sound is excellent with the internal speakers and te Vizio "tru sound" far excels the Samsung. Although it isn't promoted as such, the tru sound acts as a sound level filter too, so you aren't blasted with the louder commercial signals.I've had this tv for a month now and recommend it for anyone wanting an entry level lcd with quality.

Reviews.Title: Amazing for the money !!!
Reviews.Author: sgb
Reviews.Content: Bought this for our bedroom.  Paid $279.00 delivered and got the 3 year Square Trade Warranty for another $34.00 after discounts.  Price at BJ's $349.00 plus tax & Walmart was about the same.  I am deaf in one ear and have an aid in the other and the speakers in the TV rival my Boze system !!  Amazing product for the money !!!  Could not be happier !!!VIZIO E320VA 32-Inch 720p LCD HDTV, Black

Reviews.Title: Vizio E320VL 32" TV
Reviews.Author: numach
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price.  Picture quality is better than expected.  The only thing this is lacking is full 1080p support (it has 1080i) but *very* little of what is broadcast right now even uses 1080p.  The room I put this is in not all that big (about 15' x 12') and it is just the right size for where I have it at.  Great color and contrast, automatically adjusts picture modes, and enough ports to connect my Xbox, PS3, and cable settop box with room for 2 other devices.  This is a good buy for anyone on a bit of a budget.

Reviews.Title: Vizio
Reviews.Author: Claudia Hart
Reviews.Content: So far not a bad TV.  It's pretty much what I expected.  The one thing they don't show you in the stores is that just because it's wider doesn't mean regular tv will fill the screen.  Something I didn't look into closely enough.  you can change the settings so the picture does fill the screen but you either cut off the tops of heads or it looks short and stretched.  normal view is like watching it on a regular crt tv.Other than that it's a great tv and we are enjoying the clarity and crisp colors that you don't get from the crt's.

Reviews.Title: watchit
Reviews.Author: Dana R. Mihalik
Reviews.Content: great picture, nice looking lcd.  The only drawback is the sound quality.  For the money I give it 4.5 stars out of 5.

Reviews.Title: Great TV For The Price
Reviews.Author: Jean M. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Although it's not 1080p, it doesn't matter due to the size of the TV, as 720p works just fine.  The sound quality seems good, and the ability to play slideshows directly off of a flash-drive loaded with jpegs is pretty handy.  I discovered that this TV is virtually identical to my 42" LG LCD TV.  The button styles, and locations are the same, the menus navigate the same, (but are styled different), Even the box was packaged the same.  The remote is really legit and it looks great in my breezeway.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, Great cost
Reviews.Author: T. S. Crider
Reviews.Content: On sale at $320, this TV is the best value for the quality. The TV tuner is 720p, but the screen is capable of 1080i resolution so a computer, Blu-Ray or X-Box can be comfortably hooked up. Excellent TV for small room/bedroom use. Built in sleep timer, lots of ports, fairly easy-to-use remote control and light weight are all nice additional features. The only downside so far (one full day of ownership here) is the "Vizio" emblem on the front is lit up at all times whether the TV is off or on. Not a good idea if you like it dark in the room. A minor inconvenience (electrical tape blends right in to the bezel) at worst. Overall, it's a good purchase so far.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money. Recommended tv.
Reviews.Author: sdh
Reviews.Content: Great picture but I noticed a buzzing sound in the speakers when turned down to vol 1-7. A little annoying if the tv has to be turned down. I dont know if it was the set or what it was. The first one did it and I took it back then the second one did it. After passing the low volumes, I cant even notice the sound.  Its an awesome tv other than that sound issue. If I didnt have enough money to buy a 120Hz I wouldve stuck with this one!

Reviews.Title: Fine Picture and through HDMI Music plays way louder than dialogue
Reviews.Author: James Wagner
Reviews.Content: Fine Picture and through HDMI Music plays way louder than dialogue.We kept for a couple of weeks and the need to adjust sound everytime backgroud music came into play proved a deal breaker.The Vizio logo glows 24/7 so this required some tape to cover for bedroom use.

Reviews.Title: Good while it lasts
Reviews.Author: Erin Engelhardt
Reviews.Content: This TV seems to be a great when you first get it... sets up easily... great picture... then done 3 weeks later. We are on our second Vizio, and both ended with the same problem... go to power on the TV and it freezes with the Vizio name on the screen. Can't power it off or on with the remote or on TV itself... Must unplug. Called customer service... followed directions to reboot..TV totally died. This problem happened twice.. each within only having the TVs for a few weeks. Won't be getting another one!

Reviews.Title: Excellent HDTV & Great w/ Standard Definition channels too!
Reviews.Author: Deb in SA "Deb in SA"
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV last Saturday & it arrived on Tuesday and in great shape-excellent Amazon service!Looked at a lot of TVs & read tons of reviews. Thought I wanted a 40" LCD and saw a great one at Costco for $599-the other TV that caught my eye was a Vizio 32" and the sound was great.  Came home and used blue tape on  the wall to get idea of how new TV would fit & 40" just bigger than I wanted even though per Amazon chart should get that size due to sitting 11" away.  32" better size so read reviews & TV I saw at Costco was Vizio e320VA but that one had more negative comments about sound and this one seems to be newer model  with better reviews & better contrast ratio. (If you are a Sam's Club member this TV is about $295 at Sams online-but I did not want to pay for a membership.)On to TV-so glad I read so many reviews.  Easy for one person to lift and set-up and Vizio packaging easy to open (read the box-you don't need to cut it open.) The menu to adjust sound, screen fit, and picture is intuitive and easy to use.  Love that they give you named sound and picture options to choose from so you don't have to tweek everything individually if you don't want to.  I too did not like the TruSurround & TruVolume features so went into the Audio Advanced settings & turned them off-got this tip from other reviews.  I have it plugged into a surge protector/power strip so when not using I power the whole thing off so not drawing any power and my settings are still there when I power it back on-who wants to pay for electricity when not watching the TV...? (Anything with a logo that glows or that has a remote draws a little power so you can turn it on with the remote-rather than unplugging it use a power strip with a switch & surge protection.)I have Standard Time Warner cable with no set-top box & I don't want to up-grade now & when scanned for channels the digital channels of local stations my old 20" SDTV picked up are actually HD channels-so you may get some HD channels without having to change your service. Even the Standard Def channels look better!  Seems on older HDTVs and on bigger HDTVs others had problems with SD channels but SD channels look great on this TV (I have great long distance vision so it's not because I can't see that far away.) I also hooked up my 2005 Samsung DVD  player & looked great & then switched to component cable (red/blue/green) and even better (change your DVD settings if you do this)-Prince of Persia looked awesone!  I don't know what BlueRay or 1080p could add-the picture was fantastic and sound was very good.  Research I've read says that newer LCD TVs upconvert DVDs even without an upconverting DVD player.So the size for me is great (I did not want the TV to totally dominate my living room), the picture is fantastic (excellent contrast, color & definition), its also very good viewing at all angles & the non glare screen is great if sun coming through window.  The sound is great for me-I am not going to get a surround sound system but can see why someone might-but I don't need to feel explosions all around me, etc.What would I improve?  Add some glow in the dark buttons to the remote.Get it-you won't be sorry!  Amazon gives you 30 days to return it & free shipping-excellent. So I spent $330 for this HDTV when I had budgeted $600-awesome!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Value
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up - excellent menu system that guides you through the initial set up.  Excellent picture and sound. Tremendous value.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO - Good Product, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Jim "Jim"
Reviews.Content: This is the second Vizio 32" HDTV I have purchased.  I've had mine for a little over a year and the newest one was purchased as a gift for my son.  Picture and sound quality are good.  I have no experience with the warranty or Vizio customer service;I've never used it.  You can get HDTVs with better picture quality, but I don't know of any for the price of these sets.  Wait for the sales and you can get one for less than $300.  As far as value, these are tops.  My next set will be a larger 1080P and I will certainly look at the Vizios.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be more pleased!!
Reviews.Author: Angela G.
Reviews.Content: The price was unbeatable and the delivery from Amazon was in 2 days due to a local warehouse in my area. We are totally happy with the purchase and have had no trouble at all with this TV. Set-up was quick and easy. Very satisfied with the picture quality and the audio.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: slick
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for the price.  The quality is great, the size is much bigger than my usual tv, and the price was amazing.  I like using it as a monitor for my side PC to use it.

Reviews.Title: will it work in a few months?
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: I purchased a similar VIZIO TV 9 months ago. The display has now has light spots and concentric circles on it. Vizio had me send photos and their technicians have determined that it is defective and must be replaced. As it is still under warranty, I have been instructed to ship it back (AT MY EXPENSE!). Further, I have been told I will receive a replacement in an already opened box, as it will be reconditioned or in some other way, not "new". I am disgusted with the fact that1) a new TV does not work after 9 months,2) I must pay to ship it back3) it will be replaced with something in an open box that will come with a new set of problems.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E320vl
Reviews.Author: nello
Reviews.Content: Good TV for the money.  Had it for many months now and no problems popped up.  I liked the front firing speakers.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Marmy
Reviews.Content: Ordered this as a refurb so I was a little worried, but it's great. Not a scratch to be found. Picture and sound is wonderful, and I don't see there being any problems any time soon! Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Flat Screen Vizio
Reviews.Author: loveyourdog
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the money! I love the picture and the sound is good. Just as good as a new TV.

Reviews.Title: Great, Great TV!
Reviews.Author: R. W. Henderson "Do the right thing even if i...
Reviews.Content: I bought this and had it shipped to my APO here in Iraq. I also bought a second one for my Dad in Florida. They arrived fully boxed and in Brand New condition! I have been using it now for a few months and love it! Great picture, great sound and very, very well worth the price! I highly recommend this TV! You will not be dissatisfied! I love VIZIO and have had no problems with their TVs in the past. My Dad is super happy with his as this is his first LCD TV. He's (70) LOL.

Reviews.Title: great picture clarity and excellent sound
Reviews.Author: Deborah K. Vollmer "debv"
Reviews.Content: I love this Vizio tv.  The picture and sound are great.  I liked it so much that I bought them for my two daughters also.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: Sammy Calabrese
Reviews.Content: The Vizio 32" lcd tv is a great product. The tv's picture quality is outstanding, especially when watching shows on the HD channels. The only problem is the sound fluctuates like all other vizio products. Other than that, it is a great purchase for the price.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 32-inch HDTV!!!
Reviews.Author: Major T.
Reviews.Content: Great product as reviewed by other customers.  Easy to set up, only took a couple of moments.  Received the TV within the time they said.  Great customer service, no complaints at this time.  Would recommend this HDTV to anyone, this is better resolution than my 42-inch Panasonic.Thanks Digideals.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: SLyons7
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the quality of this TV. I doubt I could find a better TV for that price, anywhere. I mainly purchased it to watch Blu Rays in HD and the picture quality is amazing. Do yourself a favor and buy this TV.

Reviews.Title: Just got this beautiful TV!
Reviews.Author: Erik
Reviews.Content: Okay, so this review is a bit premature. I received this TV yesterday and watched some movies, Netflix Wii, and TV on it. It was dark at first, but I found the Vivid picture setting, and that seemed to make it a lot better. May still want to adjust the picture some so it's closer to colors, but so far so good. For the price I paid, it's 10 times better than the old analog. This is my first HD television.Like the size, although clearly you always want a few more inches post-purchase, but for the $220 deal I got this on Secondipity, I couldn't pass it up!I plan to use this with my laptops that have broken LCDs as well. Wireless keyboard setup? Can you say, Hulu?Also, the speakers are so much better compared to the regular 30" box TV we had. they also don't blast backwards through the walls like the other did, so we can sleep when my girlfriend or I want to stay up later and watch something.Covering up the Vizio logo is recommended if that bothers you, but I kind of like it.The only con I can think of right now is the remote. Vizio is famous for making cool remotes, but this one does not light up at all and the organization isn't the best. Fumbling in the dark to find a particular button is a real chore.That's all for now.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for our bedroom
Reviews.Author: J. Vold
Reviews.Content: We purchased this tv for our bedroom and it has met all of our expectations. The tv offers high quality at the perfect price from Amazon. Currently we only have local stations that come through in HD, but the non-HD channels have high quality on this smaller screen. Vizio is a strong competitor to the LG and Samsung market- these are the only 3 manufacturers that I would buy an HD tv from. I have purchased 2 LG HD tv's and this meets the quality that I am used to.Thank you!

Reviews.Title: not the best but really good.
Reviews.Author: standardalias
Reviews.Content: The sound was a little wonky at first, but after I turned the enhanced sound or what ever it's called off it's been great. It is serving as a computer monitor and also have my cable box and xbox360 hooked up to it. The price is great for what you're getting and when i ordered it thursday afternoon it arrived in new york monday morning which was really nice.

Reviews.Title: Great tv, Great buy
Reviews.Author: Nathan
Reviews.Content: Hands down the best purchase I have made. Great bargain as well when shopping around online & in various stores found that pricing was $200 more then I paid for on this site.nothing to down rate but the sound sometimes comes across quiet but ill be purchasing a surround sound accessory so not to worried about that. Other then that awesome TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice affordable HDTV
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: The size is nice. The still picture quality is pretty awesome.I did not give it 5 stars because the refresh rate is not very good at all. When a movie is moving very fast, like an action scene, it gets fuzy and best and blury at worst. I guess thats what all 60hz TVs do.  A 120hz would be good, but they cost at least $100 more.I bought this for less than $300 at Sams on black friday so I am very pleased with it.  However, I would not pay more.  One other thing i should add is that you will need a soundbar or 5.1 surround system.  These 10watt speakers just dont cut it. I reccomend either the Hibachi w/wireless subwoofer (incredible bass), or the Vizio w/wireless subwoofer.HDTV + soundbar = sweet setup.  I get compliments from all who visit my small apartment on my system

Reviews.Title: Worth buying!
Reviews.Author: ritish
Reviews.Content: This is totally worth it, bought this tv for about 250(used) and it is great. i recommend it to anyone out there purchasing an hdtv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: baxter29
Reviews.Content: We received both tv's very quickly before Christmas. The quality looked great, perfect enough for our teen's room. The xbox games look amazing.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great For the price ..Perfect for the Bedroom!
Reviews.Author: Chris5775
Reviews.Content: This was such a great deal we dedcided to buy 2 and replace the existing bedroom T.V's we could notbe happier with the choice.

Reviews.Title: I will never buy another vizio product
Reviews.Author: Erik
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv in February of 2011 form a local store. It worked fine for about two months and then my HDMI ports quit working. It took me a couple of months to call and get them fixed but it got fixed under warranty in September of 2011 by getting the mother board replaced. Well here I am six months later out of the tv's one year warranty and the tv went off and won't turn back on. I called Vizio and explained the problem and she told me that the motherboard is bad. I told her I just had it replaced and she told me she had it in her records that it was replaced in September 2011. I asked if she warrantied the replacement parts and said it was only a three month warranty. She said all she can do is give me the number to a repair person but the cost is going to be more than the tv even costs. It worked from February of 2011 to April of 2012 and thats all. What a waste of money. I will never again in my life buy another vizio product. They have the worst costumer service also. I am very disappointed. 14 months for $300 bucks. That price would have been a decent deal if the tv would have lasted for 3 or 4 years but for 1 year that is the most expensive tv I ever purchased. Stay away from Vizio and if you don't take my word for it and go buy one then you can't say I didn't warn you.

Reviews.Title: Base is very unstable
Reviews.Author: TOPJOB7 "topjob7"
Reviews.Content: I got the 1080P version of this monitor with the exact same base.  It was very unstable and tipped over, shattering the screen, which is quite fragile (unlike our LCD computer screens).  I checked several models in the store with this base and they were all very unstable compared to other brands.Either wall mount this or keep it somewhere it won't get bumped at all.  Since many (if not most) people will use the base stand it comes with, I thought this was important to let people know.  Very disappointed in this design.

Reviews.Title: Worked for a day
Reviews.Author: Ben W
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV as a Christmas gift for my sister.  We hooked it up.  The picture was great everything looked to be working fine.  The next day the TV would not turn on.  She called a technician he came out to troubleshoot and said the fault was with the tv.  She told me about it I emailed Amazon and the only option I had was to return it.  Maybe it's a good product but from my experience it just wasn't working.

Reviews.Title: PC Audio Input?
Reviews.Author: Beefer
Reviews.Content: The picture of the rear panel connections for the PC Audio Input on Amazon shows an "S" video input!? However, at Vizio's website, the user manuel (PDF file) shows an 1/8" mini plug stereo connector. Can anybody confirm this who has purchased the e320vl?[...]

Reviews.Title: Samsung WatchOn (Peel) Causes TV to no longer power on
Reviews.Author: C. Schafer
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV in August of 2010 and it worked well for me for 3 1/2 years. I recently got a new Samsung Galaxy S4 and was playing with the WatchOn (powered by Peel) app that comes with the phone which makes it a universal remote control.  I pressed a button in the OTA settings of WatchOn which briefly brought up a parental control screen on the Vizio TV, the TV then shutoff, and never turned on again. I couldn't believe that a universal remote could damage a TV so I tried to power cycle, unplug, etc., called Vizio's tech support and no luck. There only advice was to call a 3rd party repair service as the TV is out warranty.A little web searching revealed this a repeated problem with this Vizio TV and WatchOn. I silly App and a some poorly designed (or at least poorly tested) Vizio TV firmware cost me ~$300. Hopefully this won't affect anyone else. I am bummed...[...]

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: K. V. Walbeek "Gramma2b"
Reviews.Content: Had to buy a new TV and decided on this VIZIO.  We only use ours to watch non-cable/non-DISH TV stations and DVD/BluRay watching.  Picture is really clear and sharp.  Had to move it to our new home and held up during the move!  It was easy to set up again as well!  I will buy another VIZIO!!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: - Solid HDTV for the price- Picture is pretty good- I guess it's a little large- I've had mine almost two years with no problems whatsoever

Reviews.Title: My Husband loves watching tv
Reviews.Author: Nancy Broad
Reviews.Content: My husband loves watching tv and he loves it loud, thid tv works with his earphones so he does not blast me out of the house.  Plus if we ever need to move it - we can!!!  His old tv weighed a ton AND  neither one of us could move it an inch!  Thank you

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Aislinn Wallace
Reviews.Content: I love this tv! It was a GREAT price. The clarity is good and so is the sound. There were a few smudges on it, besides that it looks brand new!It was a great addition to my room.

Reviews.Title: Great tv.
Reviews.Author: Samuel G
Reviews.Content: Awesome tv for the price and all the plug in's work great. Love the wide varity of hook ups. Looks great.

Reviews.Title: 32 inch
Reviews.Author: Jaleen J.
Reviews.Content: Purchased for a college student. The tv has held up thru the many moves. Works and looks great. Ordered the remote and was good to go.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Julie Zelaya
Reviews.Content: Got it, can't complain everything works great and the image quality good for the price. Hope it last long as i just got it.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV at the end of 2010 as a gift for my mother. The picture was sharp and brilliant and for her the 720p, 32 inch was perfect because it fit into her entertainment center and she probably couldn't tell the difference between 1080 and 720 especially on a 32 inch screen. The other benefit of this set is that the speakers are front mounted to the set. It is not firing the sound down or back so she can hear it clearly.It has been a full 2 years and it is working fine with no issues whatsoever.I purchased this Visio because I own a Visio and found it to be a good value.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I received this unit today.  Excellent shipping.  Assembled on stand and configured in just about 30 minutes.  Looks great, easy to set up, and sounds great.  Would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: W. Ebert
Reviews.Content: Nice TV great picture and sound. This is my second Visio and recommend them to everyone. A great deal on a LCD TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: M. Singleton "soccermom 3"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for a Christmas gift and was very pleased with the picture and sound. It arrived promptly and well packaged. Vizio products are affordable and well made. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Works very well
Reviews.Author: hi
Reviews.Content: This TV was for my home office and is the perfect size. The picture is very clear, the sound is excellent and it was very much worth the money. Not a high end TV but it makes for a great "spare room" TV for sure.

Reviews.Title: 720 lcd fine for Me.
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Nice TV. Good Customer Service were right there for the Customer with knowledge of the Product which I was very happy to find at that level of sales.

Reviews.Title: Really Nice TV
Reviews.Author: kcastor
Reviews.Content: We got this TV and set it up within minutes. It was easy to get started and the internal setup was just as easy.The picture quality on this Vizio is amazing. Everything is really clear. We have a Samsung DLP as well and I would say that as far as clarity goes this product is even better.I would highly recommend getting this Vizio or any Vizio for that matter. Everyone I know who has one loves it and I probably won't buy any other brand from now on.

Reviews.Title: Great cost effective purchase
Reviews.Author: DJ
Reviews.Content: 32 inch screen  Clear picture  Very happy! Would recommend to others. Price was far below what I would have spent elsewhere. Loved that fact that it was delivered!

Reviews.Title: OK While It Lasted
Reviews.Author: drbarry1 "drbarry1"
Reviews.Content: I got this TV at the beginning of March 2012.  The picture and sound were OK (but not great) for my bedroom until the beginning of August when the unit, while its power to the set light glowed, simply would not turn on.  I've always been somewhat leary of buying products from companies with such a short history (10 years of existence in this case) compared to the major bands like Sony, Panasonice etc.  Vizio reminds me of the Contec brand TVs that came out during the 80s when I was selling home electronics while in school.  They didn't then and Vizio doesn't now seem to have their act together.  The quality obviously just isn't there.  I would not buy another Vizio product again.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good TV!
Reviews.Author: Frank Kowalski
Reviews.Content: I had this TV for about a year now and it runs like new.  I am happy with it.  I would buy it again.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: vizio 32 inch
Reviews.Author: booron
Reviews.Content: I got set has excellent picture and works well only the volumn goes in and out fromtime to time but will connect to a sound system to see if that helps

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: Learning everyday "student of the word"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV back in January for my study room and it's been a great performer for the last 8 months.  I use it a lot; every day, I spend 8-12 hours in my study room and the TV is on almost always.  The picture is brilliant and the sound is magnificent.  In fact, the sound is so good, I get complaints from my neighbors that the TV is too loud.  I've used the HDMI function, watching movies from my computer and it's as simple as possible.  I paid a lot more than it's selling for now and I'm extremely happy with the TV.  At $250 or so, this is a steal.  I'm considering buying a second one.

Reviews.Title: I love my new TV
Reviews.Author: Matriarch "Matriarch"
Reviews.Content: I love my new TV.  Easy set up, great picture quality and great price.  What a great deal

Reviews.Title: Vizio TV Review
Reviews.Author: Peter Romano
Reviews.Content: Picture is good,  TV looks sleek.  Sound quality is a little tough to get to just the right level, but satisfactory

Reviews.Title: 32 VISIO LCD TV
Reviews.Author: PAUL RICE
Reviews.Content: This TV is nice. Its my first flat screen so I don't know how others look or operate but so far I am very satisfied with it. I am especially happy with the ability to connect my laptop to the TV with a monitor cable and get the TV to turn into a giant laptop monitor. With some good computer speakers with a sub woofer, my saved digitized movies I have on my haddrive plays great on the TV just like they were a DVD. Youtube viedos play good also of course...

Reviews.Title: Good TV great price
Reviews.Author: P. Lowes
Reviews.Content: Just bought 2 TV's, very happy with the purchase.  Read all the reviews and Consumer report ratings and decided that this was perfect.  TV was out of the box and set up in 3 minutes flat. The SRS Truvolume doesn't seem to adjust as well as I'd like, but commercials are always louder than you want them to be.  Great picture. Great price. Easy set up.

Reviews.Title: Our 2nd Vizio.  Excellent
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: This is our second Vizio.  Both have been excellent. No sound problems for us, and I was in professional sound for forty years, so I should know.  Not saying others haven't had problems, just not us.Can't say much about warranty or remote.  Don't use the Vizio remote, and the unit hasn't needed serviceOnly thing I don't like with this model is the turn-on time.  But that is minor.  Overall five stars

Reviews.Title: Great 720p tv the best vizio i have ever owned.
Reviews.Author: nathan
Reviews.Content: So far this Vizio is the best one I ever had. great picture, great sound quality, not so sure about the warranty thats why i gave it a one. but other than that out of all 20 Flat screen tv's i have owned this one shines above them all. would definitely buy another one if i had the money.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Television - *1080P*
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: NOTE: THE TV IS 1080PI know the Amazon page states the set as being 720p, but as other reviewers have commented, the TV is full 1080p. I would have been fine with 720p, but I am not complaining with a free unexpected upgrade. And also note that the sound is fine. I turned off the surround sound option on the TV and everything is clearly audible while the TV is at a low volume level, although there is a slight electrical hum. You could BLAST the sound with this TV if you wanted to.I bought this TV as a bedroom set. My girlfriend and I like to watch Netflix movies, but my roommates often hog the living room TV. The 32" size is sizable for being at the foot of my queen bed. A 37" might be nicer, but 32" is plenty large for the distance. This TV also is designed very elegantly, unlike similar models from Toshiba and Samsung that I compared it with.All around an excellent TV for the $300 price tag I paid in April 2011.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I've come to rely on customer reviews, so I figured it was time to do my part.  I'm VERY happy with this TV ( I've had it a month) and I am a AV Professional.  The image quality for the price is just great.  I couldn't be happier.  I'm using HDMI off my cable box for TV.  Component from my DVD/DVR recorder and the 2nd HDMI from my Laptop with a long HDMI cable......which works great as well.I'm running the audio through my receiver so I can't review the speakers.  My only con is the menu for switching inputs reverts too quickly, but its passible.  Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Bonita1005
Reviews.Content: This was my first time buying a refurbished TV but it's something i will definitely do in the future. I was prepared for there to be some slight cosmetic damage but there's NONE. Looks brand new and (so far) is working perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Liked
Reviews.Author: AMD
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with the TV. All the reviews described the TV very accurately. For the price I feel it was a good purchase. This was purchased as a 2nd TV for our home.

Reviews.Title: Surprisely PLEASED!!!
Reviews.Author: Fred Jordan
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a inexpensive 32" Lcd tv and I kept tossing between an LG, Samsung, and this Vizio that I finally banked on because Amazon was offering the BEST PRICE at the time.  I could not be more pleased with this set which my wife and I decided to put in the master bedroom.  We had a 32" Sharp hdtv original which served its purpose at the time but I wanted to upgrade to a true flat screen 1080p resolution set.  Well what a difference this Vizio makes, the picture quality is superb, the many functions are a ease to change, sound quality is great especially through my home theater system and watching dvds is like being at the movies.  I was first alittle skeptical about the Vizio brand but after doing my normal research and comparison, I'm very happy so far, with the selection we made.  And just to think, at $298 from Amazon and the other brands were going for about $325 and up with about the same features, its a no brainer!!  Thanks again Amazon, you have my back!!!

Reviews.Title: Vizio LCD TV
Reviews.Author: bigdawgfan
Reviews.Content: Because I upgraded finally from a CRT TV to a flat screen I can say that I've been missing out. This TV has been everything that I expected and more. Picture quality is outstanding,better than other flat screens I saw. Colors are deep and rich and clarity is outstanding. I would definitely recommend this model and particularly Vizio because I shopped around everywhere for almost 2 months before settling for this one. Amazon had the equivalent price compared to anybody else on the market and free shipping also; you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: ark
Reviews.Content: WOW this TV is great for the price paid. the picture quality is really good. perfect for a bedroom tv.

Reviews.Title: I love my TV
Reviews.Author: fairlady
Reviews.Content: I love my TV, I was a little scared because i didnt really know much about the brand but i read other reviews and like what i read and i brought it. excellent price, picture, sound... IM thingking about buying another one for another room in my house!!!!!!1

Reviews.Title: Vizio
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: I've read some negative reviews, but in my experience; this TV has been fantastic. I love how articulate Amazon is with their deliveries. Package arrived in spotless condition. The TV itself is nothing short of spectacular in both picture and sound, definitely a huge bang for your buck. I would highly recommend giving this set a shot.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly Surprised
Reviews.Author: S. Bastian
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Vizio E320VL 32" LCD TV for [...] plus [...] shipping from an amazon merchant (WarehouseCentral) last week.  It truly was in "Like New-Used" condition as advertised (not a scratch on it and plastic still covering the bezel and stand).  The picture quality is very good and even the straight digital channels (480i) look decent.  The sound quality is good but i was hoping for a little more bass. I really like the full featured stylish remote that has buttons for all three inputs so you don't have to cycle through them like most remotes.  It also has buttons for a DVR if you own one.  All in all i think this TV is a great buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E320VL 32" TV
Reviews.Author: madukes
Reviews.Content: The greatest TV at a very reasonable price.  I don't think a more expensive TV would have been any better.  Great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Vollie Mathews
Reviews.Content: We purchased this television about 4 months ago. It was a great deal for the price. But to our surprise was an equally impressive value. It functions great and coordinates with my gaming consoles well. The color depth and refresh rate is awesome and really is a pleasure to use and own. I would recommend this unit to anyone. And thankfully this is the first made in America TV i have bought and I was actually not disappointed. Hopefully they can keep it going.

Reviews.Title: Great for a small room
Reviews.Author: Charles W. Cohoon
Reviews.Content: Works well in bedroom.  Would not be large enough for a family room or living roo..  In 32 inch size 720 is good.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: scottfwi
Reviews.Content: I don't have cable or satellite.  I hadn't watched television of any kind in years.  One of the things I was holding out for was a la carte purchasing of programs/channels.  It's still not quite there yet, but with the advent of Netflix streaming and Apple TV (and other products), it's getting there.So to hook up my Wii, my new Apple TV and my DVD player, I got this TV.  It's only 720p, but that's ok because of the built-in limitations of some of these devices.  More p's would be wasted, imo.I'm very satisfied.  The picture is sharp, the color is pleasing.  As per usual with televisions, the on-screen controls are awful and the remote looks like you're piloting the space shuttle, but I've seen worse.One thing you'll want to watch for in the audio controls is the "true" surround sound setting.  It's fine if you're just using the built-in speakers on the TV.  It provides faux srs or something.  But if you've got some actual surround sound speakers, make sure to turn it off.  (I got these cheapo RCA jobbers; good value http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B002PY7H3M ).  Also the volume control thingy that supposedly makes commercials no louder than your show seems like a good idea, but I swear it was doing weird things to the volume during shows, making whispers inaudible.  I shut it off.  YMMV.

Reviews.Title: Just fine for a bedroom
Reviews.Author: Lish
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my bedroom, and it has performed within expectations.  The sound isn't stellar, but from what I understand that's pretty much par for LCD TVs these days (as most folks hook them up to a surround sound system or other external speakers). Since it's used in my bedroom, I'm rarely blasting the volume, so it's just fine for me.  The picture is pretty nice in HD and ok in standard def.  Having paid $289 for it with free shipping from Amazon, I think it's a great value.

Reviews.Title: vizio 32, great $$ compared to all stores.
Reviews.Author: jeannette
Reviews.Content: GREAT $$ FOR THIS VIZIO 32 IN LCD HDTV, COMPARED TO ALL ,I SAVED $100.00 LESS. GREAT REVIEWS FOR VIZIO..

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: chester williams
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for almost a month now, my son has it in is room and it is on every day.I have nothing but good to say about it,everything works great,and the price was great ,I would surly buy another one just like it if I needed one.thanks amazon.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased with the quality of the TV
Reviews.Author: superphil "superphil"
Reviews.Content: Very good TV. Vizio is known for great picture quality and they deliver. Also the features are well thought out and reflect the needs of a modern consumer. You can't go wrong with a Vizio TV.

Reviews.Title: Absolute Garbage
Reviews.Author: PC User
Reviews.Content: Bought this set from Target about 2 months ago, worked ok for a month then the picture became distorted. Bought for a workout room so I wanted something cheap and well I certainly did get cheap. I contacted Vizio, product was still under warranty. They had me email in some photos of the screen, went ahead and did that. The replacement process is that they ship you a new set and then you ship back the defective one in the box they sent to you. It took nearly 3 weeks for the replacement set to arrive. The replacement set does not work either..does not power up!!This is either poor QC or a total lack of respect for their customers. So once again I called customer service to inform them about this defective set, guy said he would make sure that they send me a new one this time..I said WHAT?? so I guess someone else returned a defective set and they just shipped that out to me.I would not recommend this set to anyone. Its now going on over a month since original tv stopped working and I still do not have a replacement. I guess this is the risk that you run when buying over the internet,

Reviews.Title: Great buy... AND SUPER FAST
Reviews.Author: Will Morales
Reviews.Content: I ordered a refurbished 32 inch Vizio on Sunday night and received it on Wednesday morning. The tv is perfectly fine, great condition, packaging was good. I would def buy from here again.

Reviews.Title: Purchased a Lemon
Reviews.Author: K. Ryan
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Vizio E320VL brand-new at a local store.  When I connected the power, the word "Vizio" illuminated in yellow but pressing the power button "On" did nothing and pressing the remote control, also nothing.  The TV refused to activate.  I telephoned Vizio Customer Service and the representative instructed me to disconnect the power then hold the "On" button for thirty seconds, then reconnect the power.  I followed the instuctions but no change, the TV was defective right out of the box.  I know this can happen to any TV but I thought I would share my experience with this product.  I did return the E320VL to the store and swapped it for a similar priced Phillips.  At least the Phillips is working properly.

Reviews.Title: check the description
Reviews.Author: check the description
Reviews.Content: this tv is NOT a 1080p like it says in the description.  It is a 720p.  It is a 1080i which is not the same.  picture quality is good but pixelated.

Reviews.Title: misrepresented and tricked by amazon
Reviews.Author: sulliva
Reviews.Content: The set is advertised as a 1080 hd that is a complete fabrication it is in fact 720p when it arrived it had no indication as to whether is was full hd or not so I could not tell I had been duped.  When I set it up it was clearly 720p not 1080 as advertised.  It was a gift for my granddaughter so I did not want to go though the hassle Of sending it back.  In fact I dont think there is a 1080 version.  I know that full hd in a 32" set is not that important but when I buy a product I expect it to be as advertised. (there is now a correct version of the ad which shows the set as 720p. To late for me, unfortunately).

Reviews.Title: worried
Reviews.Author: bon
Reviews.Content: was not happy to find this item on my porch in the original packing.  how would it have been to have it stolen while i was at work.....

ProductInfo.Features:
100,000 to 1 Dynamic Contrast Ratio
SRS TruVolume and SRS TruSurround HD audio for advanced virtual surround sound
Exceeds Energy StarTM 4.0 guidelines
Ambient Light Sensing technology
Universal remote control
ProductInfo.Name: VIZIO E320VL 32-inch 720p LCD HDTV
